snippet: Since the 1985-86 season, 41 players have had a four-game streak similar to Jeremy Lin's for the Knicks, according to basketball-reference.com.
abstract: Since the 1985-86 season, 41 players have had a four-game streak similar to Jeremy Lin's for the Knicks, according to basketball-reference.com.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks' Jeremy Lin has scored at least 23 points in each of his last four games, including 38 on Friday night against the Lakers. He has also recorded at least seven assists in each game, and he has been efficient, shooting at least 53 percent from the field each time.

headline.main: Putting Lin's Streak in Historical Context
